forbidden.title: Continue on Desktop
forbidden.description_vrp: Only can be accessed for Published VRP

send_report.title: Your Report Submited!
send_report.description: We have sent your report to the Mediator for review. You can access your Hacker ticket directly on the dashboard or report menu.

close_send_report.title: Cancel Submit Report?
close_send_report.description: You will loose all the information you have entered for the related reports.

TextEditor.title: Insert Image
TextEditor.alert_only_select_image: Only select image that youâ€™ve confirmed you have the license to use

ChatReports.chat_alert: This chat is read only on this device. Please access using desktop to interact.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.system_notification_description: System notifications will send you updates from Sparta system
notifications.news_description: News notifications will send you updates from others

login_info.title: Login Information
login_info.login_password_description: The login password helps guarantee account and communication security.
login_info.logout_all_description: Logging out from all devices ensures that any potentially compromised sessions are terminated immediately. This is especially important if you suspect your account was accessed without your permission.
login_info.logout_all_check: By selecting this option, you will be logged out from all devices currently signed into your account, including phones, tablets, and computers. You will need to log back in on each device using your new password

two_factor_authentication.title: Two Factor Authentication
two_factor_authentication.label_2fa_description: Authenticator codes help guarantee account security.

setup_2fa.title: Setup Authenticator
setup_2fa.description: Protecting your account is our top priority. Please confirm your activity by entering your login password.
setup_2fa.description_2: Scan or Copy the 'key code' below to your authenticator app to activate your 2FA.
setup_2fa.key_phrase: Key phrases are used to restore Authenticator in case of device loss or change - make sure to secure key phrases before setting up authenticator app.
setup_2fa.important_note: Please copy the key phrase to activate the Authenticate button
setup_2fa.description_3: Please enter authenticator code from your verified Two-Factor Authenticator app.

unbind_2fa.title: Unbind Authenticator
unbind_2fa.description: Please enter authenticator code from your verified Two-Factor Authenticator app.

verify_2fa.title: Verify Your Authenticator
verify_2fa.description: Please enter authenticator code from your verified Two-Factor Authenticator app.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Please read the Privacy Policy carefully.

deactivate_account.title: Deactivate Your Account
deactivate_account.description: Find out how you can deactivate your account

information.title: Deactivate Account
information.description: You're about to start the process of deactivating your Sparta account. Your username, and public profile will no longer be viewable on the platform after 30 days of activation.

additional_information.title: What else you should know?
additional_information.information_1: You can restore you Sparta account if it was accidentally or wrongfully deactivated for up to 30 days after deactivation.
additional_information.information_2: If you just want to use your current username or email address with a different Sparta account, change them instead of deactivate your account

confirmation.title: Confirm Deactivation
confirmation.description: Protecting your account is our top priority. Please confirm your activity by entering your login password.
